en.http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/docum: Calculation: (number of recordable work-related accidents in the reporting year / total number of hours worked in a year by all employees) * 200000. The amount of 200000 hours represents the total annual working hours of 100 employees (40 hours per week for 50 weeks per year) and serves as the standard base for calculating the incidence rate over a year, applicable to undertakings with up to 250 employees

en.http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/docum: Calculation: (Scope 1 + Scope 2 GHG emissions location-based) / turnover
en.http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/label: Location-based Scope 1 and Scope 2 Greenhouse Gas Emissions intensity
en.http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/measu: The numerator is expected to be "tCO2e [utr:tCO2e]" and the denominator a currency with a unit from the iso4217 set of currencies, for example [iso4217:EUR]

en.http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/docum: Calculation: (Scope 1 + Scope 2 GHG emissions market-based) / turnover
